attributes.action: Please Lower the Age to Smoke back to 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Young People are just finding people to nuy there cigarettes for them and it has not cut the young smokers by much also the age to buy alcohol young people still do it so why dont we let them?  I understand why you put the Age restrictions up but i dont agree with i it i think at 16 young people should be allowed to smoke and drink at there own will as They need to leran how to control there drink and how to be respnsible.
